subject: Couple so far tonight
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I managed to get a Horrific AM signal due to the weather, but got a 
couple.  Sorry for the noise and interference, i just want to keep the 
files original so others can understand that this is just a radio.  I 
can clean it up and modify it, but than it won't be as impressive to 
listen to.  

-Steve H.
